About Me

Biomedical machine learning engineer

I am a machine learning researcher and engineer with a passion for exploring and researching methods to further the field of precision medicine.

During my PhD at the Max-Planck Institute for Intelligent Systems in T√ºbingen, I have worked on applying cutting-edge machine learning to several fields of biomedicine including epigenomics, proteomics, graph analysis of molecular networks, and clinical data. This experience gave me a robust multidisciplinary background that allows me to collaborate with domain experts in medicine and biology, as well as machine learning experts. I enjoy working at the intersection of the two disciplines, where the challenges inherent to the analysis of biomedical data can be tackled with state-of-the-art models and robust statistical methodologies.

In my current position as ML engineer at GSK.ai I have plenty of opportunities to collaborate and interact with medical specialists, healthcare-focused businesses, and other non-technical stakeholders.

I am particularly interested in exploring the generalization properties of deep learning within the biomedical field, with a secondary focus on explainable ML,

I have worked professionally with the more common frameworks in the Python landscape for data science and machine learning. Within this space I haveextensive experience with libraries for deep learning (mostly Pytorch) and the creation of data pipelines (Pandas, Polars, Ibis, PySpark, PyArrow).Other fields in which I have more limited experience include probabilistic modelling (e.g. with PyMC), and graph/network analysis (Pytorch Geometric, and previously Stellargraph).

Within the biomedical field, I have worked exentsively with sequencing data (ChIP-seq, ATAC-seq, sc-RNA-seq, genomic sequences), clinical data and electronic health records, protein and amino acid sequences, and more.

I like to say that what drives me most is my deep curiosity, which pushes me to always try something new. My hobbies include reading, cooking, crochet, and playing the piano.
